Look, Iâ€™ve been where you are and my only advise is to fight and push through it. Even though it feels like you canâ€™t or straight up donâ€™t want to because your exhausted, you gotta keep on. My psychologist has taught me to match the intensity that your feeling, wanna die? Go mow the lawn, dig a hole in the yard then fill it back in, throw ice at the ground. Feeling anxious/having a panic attack? DBT skills, five things you can touch, see, hear, taste and smell, dance it out. I still struggle but I can breathe a little easier and in time youâ€™ll be able to aswell.
